players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked that Bob was killed. We should all share any thoughts we have on who might be the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and found out she's the mafioso."
Diana: "I believe Charlie's investigation. We should vote for Alice to protect the town."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation; Alice is the mafioso. Let's all vote for her to end this quickly."
